author: Novelty
title: One man, one gun
review: This is basically a minifig with a gun on the stand.  It was a limited release of sorts and so is rather rare.  There's almost no building involved in this set.  The figure itself is pretty standard and can be obtained from any of the bigger sets.

author: reidak49
title: sweat   :)
review: okay you dont get much o well but you get a well armed samuri with armor and the gun and the horned helmet i wish i had a couple of these sets and the other ninjas would be very scared of these little guys

author: Gus_263
title: Classic minifigure
review: Great minifigure, isn't a set because it don't have a building or addition. The minifigure is great because not is only made with the body, legs, head and the hands, but have too a helmet with another piece on it and a gun and an armor. This became hard to find iten after it, and now it is rare, more expensive. It have too a plate, and more itens of collection. In the time that it was released, were more easy to have one... Still great now, as a classic, i rate this samurai minifigure 5/5.
